Package org.opengrok.indexer.analysis

Class FileAnalyzerFactory

java.lang.Object
org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.AnalyzerFactory
org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.FileAnalyzerFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdaAnalyzerFactory, AsmAnalyzerFactory, BZip2AnalyzerFactory, CAnalyzerFactory, ClojureAnalyzerFactory, CSharpAnalyzerFactory, CxxAnalyzerFactory, EiffelAnalyzerFactory, ELFAnalyzerFactory, ErlangAnalyzerFactory, FortranAnalyzerFactory, GolangAnalyzerFactory, GZIPAnalyzerFactory, HaskellAnalyzerFactory, HCLAnalyzerFactory, IgnorantAnalyzerFactory, ImageAnalyzerFactory, JarAnalyzerFactory, JavaAnalyzerFactory, JavaClassAnalyzerFactory, JavaScriptAnalyzerFactory, JsonAnalyzerFactory, KotlinAnalyzerFactory, LispAnalyzerFactory, LuaAnalyzerFactory, MandocAnalyzerFactory, OCamlAnalyzerFactory, PascalAnalyzerFactory, PerlAnalyzerFactory, PhpAnalyzerFactory, PlainAnalyzerFactory, PLSQLAnalyzerFactory, PowershellAnalyzerFactory, PythonAnalyzerFactory, RAnalyzerFactory, RubyAnalyzerFactory, RustAnalyzerFactory, ScalaAnalyzerFactory, ShAnalyzerFactory, SQLAnalyzerFactory, SwiftAnalyzerFactory, TarAnalyzerFactory, TclAnalyzerFactory, TerraformAnalyzerFactory, TroffAnalyzerFactory, TypeScriptAnalyzerFactory, UuencodeAnalyzerFactory, VBAnalyzerFactory, VerilogAnalyzerFactory, XMLAnalyzerFactory, YamlAnalyzerFactory, ZipAnalyzerFactory
public class FileAnalyzerFactory extends AnalyzerFactory
Factory class which creates a FileAnalyzer object and provides information about this type of analyzers.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileAnalyzerFactory

      protected FileAnalyzerFactory(String[] names, String[] prefixes, String[] suffixes, String[] magics, FileAnalyzerFactory.Matcher matcher, String contentType, AbstractAnalyzer.Genre genre, String name, boolean hasAnnotations)
      Construct an instance of FileAnalyzerFactory. This constructor should be used by subclasses to override default values.
      Parameters:
      names - list of file names to recognize (possibly null)
      prefixes - list of prefixes to recognize (possibly null)
      suffixes - list of suffixes to recognize (possibly null)
      magics - list of magic strings to recognize (possibly null)
      matcher - a matcher for this analyzer (possibly null)
      contentType - content type for this analyzer (possibly null)
      genre - the genre for this analyzer (if null, Genre.DATA is used)
      name - user-friendly name of this analyzer (or null if it shouldn't be listed)
      hasAnnotations - whether the files processed by the analyzers produced by this factory can be annotated

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Description copied from class: AnalyzerFactory
      The user-friendly name of this analyzer.
      Specified by:
      getName in class AnalyzerFactory
      Returns:
      a genre

    • getAnalyzer

      public final AbstractAnalyzer getAnalyzer()
      Get an analyzer. If the same thread calls this method multiple times on the same factory object, the exact same analyzer object will be returned each time. Subclasses should not override this method, but instead override the newAnalyzer() method.
      Specified by:
      getAnalyzer in class AnalyzerFactory
      Returns:
      a FileAnalyzer instance
      See Also:
      • newAnalyzer()

    • returnAnalyzer

      public void returnAnalyzer()
      Free thread-local data.
